seo.title: Events & What's On | The Corner House Cambridge - Live Sports, Quiz Night, Cabins
seo.description: HD sports on wall-to-wall screens and an outdoor projector, weekly quiz nights, cosy heated cabins, and flexible spaces for groups on Newmarket Road.

hero.title: Events & What's On
hero.subtitle: Matchdays, quiz nights, live music pop-ups, and private heated cabins for your crew

regularEvents.title: Matchday Live
regularEvents.description: Wall-to-wall HD screens indoors plus an outdoor projector for the biggest fixtures. Close to Abbey Stadium for pre- and post-match pints and curries.

regularEvents.title: Weekly Quiz Night
regularEvents.description: Gather a team for a friendly quiz with prizes, great pints, and Nepalese bar snacks.

regularEvents.title: Live Music & Open Mic
regularEvents.description: Occasional acoustic sets and open-mic evenings keep the front bar buzzing.

regularEvents.title: Heated Cabin Bookings
regularEvents.description: Reserve a private, heated garden cabin for small groups â€” perfect for celebrations or matchday bases.

contact.title: Plan your visit
contact.description: Book a table or heated cabin for matchdays, quizzes, and group celebrations.
